about_the_game:
Portal Guardians won't make you bored!
Fight alone or with a friend. Use a varied arsenal of weapons and traps to stop the waves of enemies! Portals have opened around the world, close them soon!

Go through story scenarios using all the power of your weapons in your arsenal and setting various traps on various places (walls, floors and ceilings). Improve your arsenal, with each level of improvement, the strength of your weapons will increase, and the power of traps will increase. Restore world order by protecting the portals while they close, don't let the monsters get there!

Key Features


  • Story Campaign - Fight off hordes of enemies and discover the mysterious force responsible for these attacks.
  • Co-op Play - Two brave heroes are at your disposal..
  • Lethal Weapon - 9 types of weapons and each with its own characteristics: magic, bows, swords, etc.
  • Death Traps - A wide range of traps that can be mounted on walls, floors and ceilings. These traps will help you get rid of the crowds of enemies, so don't forget to upgrade them!
  • Dangerous Enemies - More than 30 types of opponents with their own characteristics and characteristics! Choose your weapons and traps wisely!
  • Improvements - Upgrade weapons and traps as you progress through the campaign.
  • Extensive Replayability - The choice of difficulty will awaken the desire to return again and again!

short_description: Incinerate, cut, gut everyone who wants to get into the portal. Use the full power of your arsenal and traps! Protect the portal by destroying crowds of enemies!
